source.05150d84:
Sample expressions

<u>r'\bman\b'</u>

r- represents that it’s a raw string i.e. whatever is inside the quotes should be taken as it is.
\b- matches word boundary

<u> r'[0-9]+' </u>
All Numbers of length one or more

<u> r'[A-Za-z]+' </u>
All Alphabets of length one or more

<u> r'(.)[A-Za-z]+' </u>
Matching any symbol before or after a certain expression
